sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO JNITCMSMENU ( SITE_ID , MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_PATH , PID , "DEPTH" , "METHOD" , ISLINK , ISCNT , LINKURL , LINKTGT , TPL_ID , CNT_ID , DEF_MENU , MENU_IMG_FILE , MENU_IMG_PATH , MENU_IMG_ONM , MENU_IMG_URL , ADM_MBR_ID , ACTIVE , CCL , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL , CONTENT_SEARCH_CHK , ROBOT_YN , H_DEL , L_DEL , S_DEL , REDIRECT_URL , META_TITLE , META_SUBJECT , META_KEYWORD , META_DESCRIPTION , META_CLASSIFICATION , META_REPLY , META_LANGUAGE , META_BUILD ) VALUES ( #siteId# , #menuId# , #menuNm# , #menuPath# , #pid# , #depth# , #method# , #islink# , #iscnt# , #linkurl# , #linktgt# , #tplId# , #cntId# , #defMenu# , #menuImgFile# , #menuImgPath# , #menuImgOnm# , #menuImgUrl# , #admMbrId# , #active# , #ccl# , NOW() , NOW() , 0 , 0 , 0 , #hDel# , #lDel# , #sDel# , #redirectUrl# , #metaTitle# , #metaSubject# , #metaKeyword# , #metaDescription# , #metaClassification# , #metaRePly# , #metaLanguage# , #metaBuild# )

INSERT INTO JNITCMSMENU ( SITE_ID , MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_PATH , PID , "DEPTH" , "METHOD" , ISLINK , ISCNT , LINKURL , LINKTGT , TPL_ID , CNT_ID , DEF_MENU , MENU_IMG_FILE , MENU_IMG_PATH , MENU_IMG_ONM , MENU_IMG_URL , ADM_MBR_ID , ACTIVE , CCL , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL , CONTENT_SEARCH_CHK , ROBOT_YN , H_DEL , L_DEL , S_DEL , REDIRECT_URL , META_TITLE , META_SUBJECT , META_KEYWORD , META_DESCRIPTION , META_CLASSIFICATION , META_REPLY , META_LANGUAGE , META_BUILD ) VALUES ( #siteId# , #menuId# , #menuNm# , #menuPath# , #pid# , #depth# , #method# , #islink# , #iscnt# , #linkurl# , #linktgt# , #tplId# , #cntId# , #defMenu# , #menuImgFile# , #menuImgPath# , #menuImgOnm# , #menuImgUrl# , #admMbrId# , #active# , #ccl# , NOW() , NOW() , #isdel# , #contentSearchChk# , #robotYn# , #hDel# , #lDel# , #sDel# , #redirectUrl# , #metaTitle# , #metaSubject# , #metaKeyword# , #metaDescription# , #metaClassification# , #metaRePly# , #metaLanguage# , #metaBuild# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE JNITCMSMENU
SET MENU_NM=#menuNm# , MENU_PATH=#menuPath# , PID=#pid# , "DEPTH"=#depth# , "METHOD"=#method# , ISLINK=#islink# , ISCNT=#iscnt# , LINKURL=#linkurl# , LINKTGT=#linktgt# , TPL_ID=#tplId# , CNT_ID=#cntId# , DEF_MENU=#defMenu# , MENU_IMG_FILE=#menuImgFile# , MENU_IMG_PATH=#menuImgPath# , MENU_IMG_ONM=#menuImgOnm# , MENU_IMG_URL=#menuImgUrl# , ADM_MBR_ID=#admMbrId# , ACTIVE=#active# , CCL=#ccl# , MODIFIED=NOW() , ROBOT_YN=#robotYn# , H_DEL=#hDel# , L_DEL=#lDel# , S_DEL=#sDel# , REDIRECT_URL=#redirectUrl# , META_TITLE=#metaTitle# , META_SUBJECT=#metaSubject# , META_KEYWORD=#metaKeyword# , META_DESCRIPTION=#metaDescription# , META_CLASSIFICATION=#metaClassification# , META_REPLY=#metaRePly# , META_LANGUAGE=#metaLanguage# , META_BUILD=#metaBuild# WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND MENU_ID=#menuId#
SET TPL_ID=#tplId# WHERE MENU_ID=#menuId#
SET CNT_ID=#cntId# WHERE MENU_ID=#menuId#
UPDATE JNITCMSMENU SET "METHOD"="METHOD"+1 WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND ISDEL=0 AND "METHOD">=#method#
UPDATE JNITCMSMENU SET MENU_NM=#menuNm# WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND MENU_ID=#menuId#
UPDATE JNITCMSMENU SET "METHOD"="METHOD"+((1+#srcEMethod#)-#srcSMethod#) WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND ISDEL=0 AND "METHOD">#dstEMethod#
UPDATE JNITCMSMENU SET "METHOD"="METHOD"+((1+#dstEMethod#)-#srcSMethod#) WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND ISDEL=0 AND "METHOD" BETWEEN #srcSMethod# AND #srcEMethod#
UPDATE JNITCMSMENU SET "METHOD"="METHOD"-((1+#srcEMethod#)-#srcSMethod#) WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND ISDEL=0 AND "METHOD">#srcSMethod#
UPDATE JNITCMSMENU SET "METHOD"="METHOD"+((1+#srcEMethod#)-#srcSMethod#) WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND ISDEL=0 AND "METHOD">=#dstSMethod#

UPDATE JNITCMSMENU SET "METHOD"="METHOD"-((#srcSMethod#+((1+#srcEMethod#)-#srcSMethod#))-#dstSMethod#) WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND ISDEL=0 AND "METHOD" BETWEEN (#srcSMethod#+((1+#srcEMethod#)-#srcSMethod#)) AND (#srcEMethod#+((1+#srcEMethod#)-#srcSMethod#))
UPDATE JNITCMSMENU SET "METHOD"="METHOD"-((1+#srcEMethod#)-#srcSMethod#) WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND ISDEL=0 AND "METHOD">#srcEMethod#
UPDATE JNITCMSMENU SET MODIFIED=NOW(), ISDEL=1 WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND MENU_ID=#menuId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MIN("METHOD") as minmethod FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND "DEPTH" <= #depth# AND "METHOD" > #method# AND ISDEL=0
SELECT LPAD(COUNT(*)+1,4,'0') as NEWFOLDER FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND IFNULL(PID,'')=IFNULL(#pid#,'')
SELECT IFNULL(MAX("method"), 0) as maxmethod FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND ISDEL=0

SELECT SITE_ID , MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_PATH , PID , "DEPTH" , "METHOD" , ISLINK , ISCNT , LINKURL , LINKTGT , TPL_ID , CNT_ID , DEF_MENU , MENU_IMG_FILE , MENU_IMG_PATH , MENU_IMG_ONM , MENU_IMG_URL , ADM_MBR_ID , ACTIVE , CCL , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL , CONTENT_SEARCH_CHK , ROBOT_YN , H_DEL , L_DEL , S_DEL , REDIRECT_URL , META_TITLE , META_SUBJECT , META_KEYWORD , META_DESCRIPTION , META_CLASSIFICATION , META_REPLY , META_LANGUAGE , META_BUILD
FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE SITE_ID=#siteId# AND MENU_ID=#menuId#
FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE MENU_ID=#menuId#

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM ,SITE_ID , MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_PATH , PID , "DEPTH" , "METHOD" , ISLINK , ISCNT , LINKURL , LINKTGT , TPL_ID , CNT_ID , DEF_MENU , MENU_IMG_FILE , MENU_IMG_PATH , MENU_IMG_ONM , MENU_IMG_URL , ADM_MBR_ID , ACTIVE , CCL , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL , CONTENT_SEARCH_CHK , ROBOT_YN , H_DEL , L_DEL , S_DEL , REDIRECT_URL , META_TITLE , META_SUBJECT , META_KEYWORD , META_DESCRIPTION , META_CLASSIFICATION , META_REPLY , META_LANGUAGE , META_BUILD FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE ISDEL=0 AND ISLINK=0 AND SITE_ID=#siteId# AND PID=#menuId# ORDER BY "METHOD") WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT SITE_ID , MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_PATH , PID , "DEPTH" , "METHOD" , ISLINK , ISCNT , LINKURL , LINKTGT , TPL_ID , CNT_ID , DEF_MENU , MENU_IMG_FILE , MENU_IMG_PATH , MENU_IMG_ONM , MENU_IMG_URL , ADM_MBR_ID , ACTIVE , CCL , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL , CONTENT_SEARCH_CHK , ROBOT_YN , H_DEL , L_DEL , S_DEL , REDIRECT_URL , META_TITLE , META_SUBJECT , META_KEYWORD , META_DESCRIPTION , META_CLASSIFICATION , META_REPLY , META_LANGUAGE , META_BUILD FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE 1=1
ISDEL=0
SITE_ID=#siteId#
SITE_ID = #searchKeyword#
MENU_ID LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
$searchKeyword$
PID = #searchKeyword#
"DEPTH" = #depth#
MENU_ID = #selectList[]# OR PID = #selectList[]#
ORDER BY "DEPTH" ASC, "METHOD" ASC
limit #firstIndex#,#recordCountPerPage#

SELECT SITE_ID , MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_PATH , PID , "DEPTH" , "METHOD" , ISLINK , ISCNT , LINKURL , LINKTGT , TPL_ID , CNT_ID , DEF_MENU , MENU_IMG_FILE , MENU_IMG_PATH , MENU_IMG_ONM , MENU_IMG_URL , ADM_MBR_ID , ACTIVE , CCL , CREATED , MODIFIED , ISDEL , CONTENT_SEARCH_CHK , ROBOT_YN , H_DEL , L_DEL , S_DEL , REDIRECT_URL , META_TITLE , META_SUBJECT , META_KEYWORD , META_DESCRIPTION , META_CLASSIFICATION , META_REPLY , META_LANGUAGE , META_BUILD FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE ISDEL=0 AND SITE_ID=#siteId#
SITE_ID = #searchKeyword#
MENU_ID LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
ISCNT=0
ORDER BY "DEPTH" ASC, "METHOD" ASC

select.isEqual:
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt
FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE ISDEL=0 AND SITE_ID=#siteId#
SITE_ID = #searchKeyword#
MENU_ID LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
FROM JNITCMSMENU a LEFT JOIN JNITCMSMENU b ON a.MENU_ID = b.MENU_ID WHERE a.ISDEL=0 AND a.SITE_ID=#siteId#
a.TPL_ID = #searchKeyword#

SELECT IFNULL(MAX("DEPTH"),0) totcnt FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE 1=1
SITE_ID = #searchKeyword#

SELECT IFNULL(MAX("METHOD"),0) totcnt FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE 1=1
PID = #pid#

sqlMap.select: SELECT NEXT_ID FROM JNITSEQ WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'JNITCMSMENU_ID'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE 1=1 AND SITE_ID = #siteId# AND PID = ( SELECT PID FROM JNITCMSMENU WHERE MENU_ID = #menuId# ) AND ISDEL = 0 AND MENU_ID NOT IN (#menuId#) AND ( INSTR ( IF(LENGTH(MENU_PATH) > LENGTH(#menuPath#), MENU_PATH, #menuPath#), IF(LENGTH(MENU_PATH) <= LENGTH(#menuPath#), MENU_PATH, #menuPath#) ) = 1 )
